00033 // Constructor.
00034 CalvinToTextFile::CalvinToTextFile()
00035 {
00036   m_cb = NULL;  
00037   m_pfileStream = NULL;
00038 }
00039 
00040 // Destructor.
00041 CalvinToTextFile::~CalvinToTextFile()
00042 {
00043   if (isOpen()) {
00044     m_pfileStream->close();
00045     delete m_pfileStream;
00046   }
00047   if (m_cb != NULL) {delete[] m_cb;}
00048 }
00049 
00050 bool CalvinToTextFile::isOpen() {
00051   return ((m_pfileStream != NULL) && (m_pfileStream->is_open()));
00052 }
00053 
00054 void CalvinToTextFile::close(void)
00055 {
00056   if (isOpen()) {
00057       m_pfileStream->close();
00058       delete m_pfileStream;
00059       m_pfileStream =  NULL;
00060       if (m_cb != NULL) {delete[] m_cb; m_cb = NULL;}
00061   }
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00065 // Open the file.
00066 bool CalvinToTextFile::open(const AffxString& strFileName ) 
00067 {
00068 
00069   m_pfileStream = new std::fstream;
00070 
00071   Fs::aptOpen(*m_pfileStream, strFileName, fstream::out | fstream::binary | fstream::trunc);
00072 
00073   if (!isOpen()) {
00074     delete m_pfileStream;
00075     m_pfileStream = NULL;
00076   }
00077   return isOpen();
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 
00082 void CalvinToTextFile::write(const char *psz) {
00083   if (m_pfileStream != NULL) {
00084     m_pfileStream->write(psz, (std::streamsize)strlen(psz));
00085   }
00086 }
00087 
00088 void CalvinToTextFile::writeLine(const AffxString& str) 
00089 {
00090   std::ostringstream line;
00091   line << str << std::endl;
00092   write(line.str().c_str());
00093 }

00097 /** 
00098  * Error handling for the class.
00099  * @param strMessage - The error messagae to report.
00100  */
00101 void CalvinToText::error(const AffxString& strMessage)
00102 {
00103         Err::errAbort(strMessage);
00104 }
00105 
00106 void CalvinToText::run(const std::string& strFileNameIn,
00107                        const std::string& strFileNameOut,
00108                        bool bHeader,
00109                        bool bBody, 
00110                        bool bNewGuid,
00111                        int  iDecimalPlaces)
00112 {
00113   try   {
00114     m_strFileNameIn = Fs::convertToUncPath(strFileNameIn);
00115     m_strFileNameOut = Fs::convertToUncPath(strFileNameOut);
00116     m_iDecimalPlaces = iDecimalPlaces;
00117 
00118     if (isCalvinFile(m_strFileNameIn)) {                
00119       AffxByteArray chpFileName;
00120       chpFileName.assign(m_strFileNameIn);
00121       Verbose::out(1, "Writing file: " + m_strFileNameOut);
00122       if (m_file.open(m_strFileNameOut) ){
00123         m_bHeader = bHeader;
00124         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData genericData;
00125         OutputHeader(m_strFileNameIn, genericData, bNewGuid);
00126         if (bBody){
00127             OutputGroupsAndSets(genericData);
00128         }
00129         m_file.close();
00130       }
00131       else                      {
00132         Err::errAbort("A problem occurred while processing file (Cannot open output file) " + m_strFileNameIn);
00133       }
00134     }
00135   } 
00136 
00137   //When things go wrong see if we can die gracefully here. 
00138   catch(Except &e) {
00139     Verbose::out(0,"");
00140     error("Exception caught. "
00141           "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00142   }
00143   catch(const std::bad_alloc &e) {
00144     Verbose::out(0,"");
00145     error("std::bad_alloc caught. "
00146           "The application has run out of memory, or the calvin file is malformed."
00147           "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00148   }
00149   catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException &ce) {
00150     Verbose::out(0,"");
00151     error("affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException caught. "
00152           "Affymetrix GeneChip Command Console library has thrown an exception. "
00153           "Message is: " + affymetrix_calvin_utilities::StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ce.Description()));
00154   }
00155   catch(BroadException &e) {
00156     Verbose::out(0,"");
00157     error("BroadException caught. "
00158           "Message is: '" + ToStr(e.m_msg) + "' source file: '" + ToStr(e.m_sourcefile) +
00159           ":" + ToStr(e.m_sourceline) + "'");
00160   }
00161   catch(const std::exception &e) {
00162     Verbose::out(0,"");
00163     error("std::exception caught. "
00164           "Message is: " + ToStr(e.what()));
00165   }
00166   catch(...) {
00167     Verbose::out(0,"");
00168     error("Unknown exception caught. "
00169           "No message is available.");
00170   }
00171 }

00173 /*
00174  * Read the file into a data object.
00175  */
00176 bool CalvinToText::ReadFile(const string &fileName, GenericData &gdata)
00177 {
00178         GenericFileReader reader;
00179 
00180         // Read the file.
00181         reader.SetFilename(fileName);
00182         try
00183         {
00184                 reader.ReadHeader(gdata);
00185         }
00186         catch(...)
00187         {
00188                 return false;
00189         }
00190         return true;
00191 }

00193 /*
00194  * Output the data to the command line.
00195  */
00196 void CalvinToText::OutputData(GenericData& gdata, int groupIndex, int setIndex, int startRow, int endRow)
00197 {
00198         DataSet *set = gdata.DataSet(groupIndex, setIndex);
00199         set->Open();
00200 
00201         // Output the rows of data
00202         int8_t i8;
00203         u_int8_t iu8;
00204         int16_t i16;
00205         u_int16_t iu16;
00206         int32_t i32;
00207         u_int32_t iu32;
00208         float f32;
00209         std::string s;
00210         std::wstring ws;
00211         int nRows = set->Rows();
00212         int nCols = set->Cols();
00213         startRow = Min(Max(startRow, 0), nRows-1);
00214         if (startRow < 0) {startRow = 0;}
00215         if (endRow < 0) {endRow = nRows-1;}
00216         endRow = Min(endRow, nRows-1);
00217         AffxString strColumnName;
00218         int iDetectionColumn = -1;
00219         int iGenotypeCallColumn = -1;
00220         int iForcedGenotypeCallColumn = -1;
00221         int iChromosomeColumn = -1;
00222         if (nCols > 0)
00223         {
00224                 for (int col=0; col<nCols; col++)
00225                 {
00226                         if (col != 0) {m_file.write("\t");}
00227                         strColumnName = StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(set->Header().GetColumnInfo(col).GetName()).c_str();
00228                         if (strColumnName == "Detection") {iDetectionColumn = col;}
00229                         else if (strColumnName == "Call") {iGenotypeCallColumn = col;}
00230                         else if (strColumnName == "Forced Call") {iForcedGenotypeCallColumn = col;}
00231                         else if (strColumnName == "Chromosome") {iChromosomeColumn = col;}
00232                         m_file.write(strColumnName.c_str());
00233                 }
00234                 m_file.writeLine("");
00235         }
00236         for (int row=startRow; row<=endRow; row++)
00237         {
00238                 for (int col=0; col<nCols; col++)
00239                 {
00240                         if (col != 0) {m_file.write("\t");}
00241                         switch (set->Header().GetColumnInfo(col).GetColumnType())
00242                         {
00243                         case ByteColType:
00244                                 set->GetData(row, col, i8);
00245                                 m_file.write(::getInt((int)i8).c_str());
00246                                 break;
00247                         case UByteColType:
00248                                 set->GetData(row, col, iu8);
00249                                 if (col == iDetectionColumn) 
00250                                 {
00251                                         switch(iu8) 
00252                                         {
00253                                         case 0: m_file.write("P"); break;
00254                                         case 1: m_file.write("M"); break;
00255                                         case 2: m_file.write("A"); break;
00256                                         case 3: m_file.write("N"); break;
00257                                         default: m_file.write(::getInt((int)iu8).c_str());
00258                                         }
00259                                 }
00260                                 else if ((col == iGenotypeCallColumn) || (col == iForcedGenotypeCallColumn)) 
00261                                 {
00262                                         switch(iu8) 
00263                                         {
00264                                         case 6: m_file.write("AA"); break;
00265                                         case 8: m_file.write("AB"); break;
00266                                         case 7: m_file.write("BB"); break;
00267                                         case 11: m_file.write("NC"); break;
00268                                         default: m_file.write(::getInt((int)iu8).c_str());
00269                                         }
00270                                 }
00271                                 else if (col == iChromosomeColumn)
00272                                 {
00273                                         if ((m_iXChromosome != -1) && (m_iXChromosome == iu8)) {m_file.write("X");}
00274                                         else if ((m_iXChromosome != -1) && (m_iYChromosome == iu8)) {m_file.write("Y");}
00275                                         else  {m_file.write(::getInt((int)iu8).c_str());}
00276                                 }
00277                                 else {m_file.write(::getInt((int)iu8).c_str());}
00278                                 break;
00279                         case ShortColType:
00280                                 set->GetData(row, col, i16);
00281                                 m_file.write(::getInt(i16).c_str());
00282                                 break;
00283                         case UShortColType:
00284                                 set->GetData(row, col, iu16);
00285                                 m_file.write(::getInt(iu16).c_str());
00286                                 break;
00287                         case IntColType:
00288                                 set->GetData(row, col, i32);
00289                                 m_file.write(::getInt(i32).c_str());
00290                                 break;
00291                         case UIntColType:
00292                                 set->GetData(row, col, iu32);
00293                                 m_file.write(::getUnsignedInt(iu32).c_str());
00294                                 break;
00295                         case FloatColType:
00296                                 set->GetData(row, col, f32);
00297                                 m_file.write(::getDouble(f32, m_iDecimalPlaces).c_str());
00298                                 break;
00299                         case ASCIICharColType:
00300                                 set->GetData(row, col, s);
00301                                 m_file.write(s.c_str());
00302                                 break;
00303                         case UnicodeCharColType:
00304                                 set->GetData(row, col, ws);
00305                                 m_file.write(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(ws).c_str());
00306                                 break;
00307                         default:
00308                                 break;
00309                         }
00310                 }
00311                 m_file.writeLine("");
00312         }
00313         set->Close();
00314         set->Delete();
00315 }

00317 /*
00318  * Output the file header parameters.
00319  */
00320 void CalvinToText::OutputFileHeaderParameters(GenericData &gdata, bool bNewGuid)
00321 {
00322 //      cout << "#File Header Information" << endl;
00323 
00324         if (m_bHeader)
00325         {
00326                 if (bNewGuid)
00327                 {
00328                         m_file.writeLine("#%File=" + m_strFileNameOut);
00329                         m_file.writeLine("#%FileCreationTime=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString()));
00330                 }
00331                 else
00332                 {
00333                         m_file.writeLine("#%File=" + m_strFileNameIn);
00334                         m_file.writeLine("#%FileSize=" + ::getUnsignedInt(Fs::fileSize(m_strFileNameIn, false)));
00335                         if (gdata.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileCreationTime().length() > 0)
00336                         {
00337                                 m_file.writeLine("#%FileCreationTime=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(gdata.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileCreationTime()));
00338                         }
00339                         // Output the magic and version numbers.
00340                         m_file.writeLine("#%Magic=" + ::getInt((int)gdata.Header().GetMagicNumber()));
00341                         m_file.writeLine("#%Version=" + ::getInt((int)gdata.Header().GetVersion()));
00342                 }               
00343         }
00344 }

00346 /*
00347  * Output the header parameters.
00348  */
00349 void CalvinToText::OutputParameters(ParameterNameValueTypeIt &begin, ParameterNameValueTypeIt &end)
00350 {
00351         ParameterNameValueType param;
00352         ParameterNameValueTypeIt it;
00353         for (it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
00354         {
00355                 param = *it;
00356                 if (m_bHeader)
00357                 {
00358                         m_file.writeLine("#%" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) + "=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
00359                 }
00360                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-xChromosome") {m_iXChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00361                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-yChromosome") {m_iYChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00362                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-xChromosome") {m_iXChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00363                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-yChromosome") {m_iYChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00364         }
00365 }
00366

00370 void CalvinToText::OutputParameters(ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt &begin, ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt &end)
00371 {
00372         ParameterNameValueType param;
00373         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt it;
00374         for (it=begin; it!=end; ++it)
00375         {
00376                 param = *it;
00377                 if (m_bHeader)
00378                 {
00379                         m_file.writeLine("#%" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) + "=" +StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));
00380                 }
00381                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-xChromosome") {m_iXChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00382                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-yChromosome") {m_iYChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00383                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-xChromosome") {m_iXChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00384                 if (StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.GetName()) == "affymetrix-algorithm-param-option-yChromosome") {m_iYChromosome = ::getInt(StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(param.ToString()));}
00385 
00386         }
00387 }

00389 /*
00390  * Output the data header parameters.
00391  */
00392 void CalvinToText::OutputDataHeaderParameters(GenericDataHeader *hdr, bool bNewGuid)
00393 {
00394 //      cout << "#Data Header Information" << endl;
00395 
00396         if (m_bHeader)
00397         {
00398                 // Add the file id's.
00399                 if (hdr->GetFileId().length() > 0)
00400                 {
00401                         if (bNewGuid)
00402                         {
00403                                 m_file.writeLine("#%FileIdentifier=" + affxutil::Guid::GenerateNewGuid());
00404                         }
00405                         else
00406                         {
00407                                 m_file.writeLine("#%FileIdentifier=" + hdr->GetFileId());
00408                         }
00409                 }
00410                 if (hdr->GetFileTypeId().length() > 0)
00411                 {
00412                         m_file.writeLine("#%FileTypeIdentifier=" + hdr->GetFileTypeId());
00413                 }
00414                 if (hdr->GetLocale().length() > 0)
00415                 {
00416                         m_file.writeLine("#%FileLocale=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(hdr->GetLocale()));
00417                 }
00418         }
00419 
00420 
00421         // Add the parameters.
00422         ParameterNameValueTypeIt begin;
00423         ParameterNameValueTypeIt end;
00424         hdr->GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00425         OutputParameters(begin, end);
00426 
00427         int nParents = hdr->GetParentCnt();
00428         for (int iParent=0; iParent<nParents; iParent++)
00429         {
00430     // dont take address of temp
00431                 GenericDataHeader parent=hdr->GetParent(iParent);
00432                 OutputDataHeaderParameters(&parent, false);
00433         }
00434 }

00436 /*
00437  * Output the set information, only the header.
00438  */
00439 void CalvinToText::OutputSetInfo(GenericData &gdata, int groupIndex, int setIndex)
00440 {
00441         DataSet *pSet = gdata.DataSet(groupIndex, setIndex);
00442 //      if (!g_bNoHeader)
00443         {
00444                 m_file.writeLine("#%SetName=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(pSet->Header().GetName()));
00445 
00446                 // Add the row and column count.
00447                 m_file.writeLine("#%Columns=" + ::getInt(pSet->Cols()));
00448                 m_file.writeLine("#%Rows=" + ::getInt(pSet->Rows()));
00449         }
00450 
00451         // Add the parameters.
00452         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin;
00453         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt end;
00454         pSet->Header().GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00455         OutputParameters(begin, end);
00456         OutputData(gdata, groupIndex, setIndex, 0, -1);
00457         pSet->Delete();
00458 }

00460 /*
00461  * Output the group information.
00462  */
00463 void CalvinToText::OutputGroupInfo(GenericData &gdata, const std::wstring &groupName, int groupIndex)
00464 {
00465 //      if (!g_bNoHeader)
00466         {
00467                 m_file.writeLine("#%GroupName=" + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(groupName));
00468         }
00469 
00470         // Add each set.
00471         int iSetCount = gdata.DataSetCnt(groupIndex);
00472         for (int i=0; i<iSetCount; i++)
00473         {
00474                 OutputSetInfo(gdata, groupIndex, i);
00475         }
00476 }
00477 
00478 /*
00479  * Output the groups and sets.
00480  */
00481 void CalvinToText::OutputGroupsAndSets(GenericData &gdata)
00482 {
00483         // Add each group.
00484         WStringVector groupNames;
00485         gdata.DataGroupNames(groupNames);
00486         int iGroupCount = (int)groupNames.size();
00487         for (int i=0; i< iGroupCount; i++)
00488         {
00489                 OutputGroupInfo(gdata, groupNames[i], i);
00490         }
00491 }

00493 /*
00494  * Output the header information.
00495  */
00496 void CalvinToText::OutputHeader(const string &strFileName, affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData& genericData, bool bNewGuid)
00497 {
00498         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericFileReader reader;
00499         reader.SetFilename(strFileName);
00500         reader.Open(genericData);
00501 
00502         OutputFileHeaderParameters(genericData, bNewGuid);
00503         OutputDataHeaderParameters(genericData.Header().GetGenericDataHdr(), bNewGuid);
00504 }
00505 
00506 bool CalvinToText::isCalvinFile(const AffxString& strFileName)
00507 {       
00508         AffxBinaryFile file;
00509         if (!file.open(strFileName, AffxBinaryFile::LOAD)) {return false;}
00510         unsigned char ucFileType = file.readUnsignedChar(); 
00511         file.close();
00512         if (ucFileType == 59) {return true;}
00513         else {return false;}
00514 }
